metadata.title: CVE-2024-39330 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Django 5.0 before 5.0.7 and 4.2 before 4.2.14.Derived classes of the django.core.files.storage.Storage base class, whenthey override generate_filename() without replicating the file-pathvalidations from the parent class, potentially allow directory traversalvia certain inputs during a save() call. (Built-in Storage sub-classes areunaffected.)

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
